DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : ENERGY
DOC.TEXT: California Energy Wins Magma Shareholder List : A Nevada state court ruled that Magma Power Co . must supply the Omaha-based company with the names.California Energy Co . is attempting a hostile_takeover . Last Friday , the geothermal power_company boosted its bid for San Diego-based Magma Power to $ 38.50 a share , or $ 925 million , from its earlier offer of $ 35 a share , or $ 840 million . The court ruled late Monday that Magma must provide the shareholders ' names to Ben Holt , a director of California Energy who is also a Magma shareholder . Holt had sued Magma individually to obtain the list . " It ' s not a significant setback , " said Jon Peele , Magma ' s general counsel .
